attributes.action: We would like to protest about Welsh finances being spent on English follies that have no value in Wales. viz. the "Victorian Piers".
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We, the undersigned, would like to stop any restoration of an outdated erection, viz. the Colwyn Bay Pier. We feel that there are more worthy causes than the restoration of an English folly, that has no place in Welsh culture, either when it was erected, or even more less relevant now, in the the culture of devolution and freedom.
